comment.author: 10206399@N00
comment._content: Those things sticking out like spines are called "Cleco" fasteners; spring-loaded clips used for holding thin sheets together while riveting.

comment.author: 11582765@N00
comment._content:
Is this photo staged? I does not look like there is a set in the rivet gun. Also I wonder if it was common for women doing that kind of work to wear that much makeup.
Dave

comment.author: 77975599@N03
comment._content: Whether for publicity or actual, the quintessential Rosie The Riveter, that helped put em in the air.  God bless the American Women that came out of the kitchen and into the workforce when the Country needed her; couldn't have done without her.
